name: Legend of Lubi
description:
NOTE: this demo is still in development. Uploads do not guarantee quality nor performance.

With your planet on the brink of a new ice age, the doves call upon their greatest warrior to look for a new habitat. The mission comes to a dramatic halt when you crash land on a foreign planet where you discover a power... that could change the universe.

Legend of Lubi is the crazy attempt of a team trying to mix the silly into a serious whole. The lighthearted tone of steampunk spacebirds is offset by the dramatic plot that will see your species extinct if no action is taken.

Furthermore this project showcases the groundworks of Physics2dx, a system that allows to switch between 2D and 3D physics on a dime. This presented a great number of opportunities and challenges that this project only just skims the surface of! 

The project teems with experimentation and personal growth and we hope it speaks to the average player as well.
